EmailTemplate.name: RE: Getting started again (1362176138.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Getting started again (1362176138.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Leigh Anne, Thank you for reaching out! I would be happy to speak with you about our services. I would like to take a few minutes to discuss with you the setup process and what it takes to engage your client in order to begin billing and receiving payment from them. Would you have a few minutes to speak on Monday and I could answer any questions you may have? You may also easily select a time to speak that is convenient for you by clicking on my online schedule <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeFRavEs46viYL7rNmDjBc5TmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. I look forward to speaking with you, have a great weekend!Nicolette From: leighslate@aol.com [mailto:leighslate@aol.com] Sent: Thursday, February 28, 2013 11:49 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Getting started again Miss Taylor, Good morning. I wanted to reach out and ask a couple questions of you. I have been in the MBO system for a number of years but inactive for the last few. I am now working on some projects as an independent consultant for a company in Texas and wanted to run my income as payroll through MBO. Could you please provide me with the address and/or methodology for effacing such a transfer of funds? They, the company, are looking for the correct way to transfer the funds.Thanks for your help.Sincerely, Leigh Anne Slate
